fields.request: Manual QA: Ensure auto-upgrade runs outside Celery shutdowns
fields.request_details:
1. Configure a node with auto-upgrade enabled and Celery running under systemd (locks/service.lck present).
2. Trigger an upgrade via the Django admin or shell so Celery launches `check_github_updates`.
3. While the upgrade runs, confirm the Celery service is allowed to stop without interrupting the upgrade by watching `logs/auto-upgrade.log` and the upgrade script output.
4. After completion, run `./status.sh` to verify the upgrade finished and services restarted.
5. Review the upgrade report entry to ensure no failover was recorded during the detached run.
